understanding-json_key2: Sabse pehle hum JSON objects ke saath `code` karna seekhenge. Aapne **introduction** mei yeh padha hoga ki JSON objects kya hote hai. Ab yeh video dekho, aur iss example ko likh kar run karne ki koshish karo.
understanding-json_key3: JSON aur Dictionary mei kya difference hai?
understanding-json_key4:
Dictionary aapka ek data structure hai jo memory (jaise RAM) mei store hota hai.
JSON ek `file` based **exchange** format jisse ki alag alag programs ek doosre se baat kar sakte hai ya information exchange kar sakte hai. Jaise:
understanding-json_key5: Ek program json mei kuch information `output` kar sakta hai, jo doosra program padh sakta hai
understanding-json_key6: Server apna data `json` mei available kara sakta hai, jisko koi bhi client use kar kar apna programs aur behetar kar sakte hai
